creator: Happyly LLC
descriptionHtml:
We are a Happy Active community of parents, grandparents, caregivers and friends committed to spreading goodness in the world.

By sharing Happy Active Family ideas and insight, we seek to increase the quality time that you spend with your loved ones. We recognize that time is the most precious resource of all and our goal is to help streamline your ability to plan fulfilling weekend, evening and day time activities that nourish the entire family. We believe that being active and outdoors promotes a physical, mental and spiritual life full of positivity for kiddos, parents and caregivers.

Thank you for putting your trust in us and for the opportunity to help you create meaningful Happy Active memories.

We are new and strive to be better every day so we welcome feedback (positive and constructive) and new contributors to our community. We can be contacted at team@happyactivefamily.com.
descriptionShort: Find your happy, active, family friendly experience.

title: happyly

creator: Happyly LLC
descriptionHtml:
happyly is your go to resource for finding kid-friendly activities in your area, providing local reviews of awesome things to do in your home city, or when your family is on the go.

We are committed to helping your family spend less time planning, and more time exploring life together.

Top Features:
— Discover: Choose your own adventure by searching for activities by type, age of child, weather, and more.
— Favorites: Found the perfect playground for your tot or bike path for you and the crew? Save it for later with Favorites.
— Plans: Choose from our trusted local reviews and recommendations to build a day full of activities and invite others to join in on the fun.

What you can expect from us?
Locals’ knowledge around great playgrounds, hiking, walking, stroller running trails, where to play inside, kid-friendly eats, and more.

We provide weekend round-ups and where-to-play inspiration in:
• Washington, DC
• Baltimore, MD
• Boston, MA
• Brooklyn, NY
• Nashville, TN
• Jackson, WY
• Plus, new cities launching monthly

We also have local reviews & activities in:
• Annapolis, MD
• Asheville, NC
• Atlanta, GA
• Austin, TX
• Charlotte, NC
• Charleston, SC
• Chicago, IL
• Denver, CO
• Leavenworth, WA
• New York City, NY
• Park City, UT
• Raleigh, NC
• Salt Lake City, UT
• San Diego, CA
• Seattle, WA
• Wilmington, NC.

Are we missing your city? Let us know and we would love to talk with you! team@happyly.com

Terms of Use: https://www.happyly.com/pages/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.happyly.com/pages/privacy
descriptionShort: Find your happy, active, family friendly experience.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
1. New home page updates UI designs.
2. Save adventure as a draft.
3. Map icons for hikes, playgrounds, and restaurants.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Hi friends so much is new! People now more than ever need to make time for themselves, their families, and their community. To help you create more meaningful connections and have happier days, we’re introducing a new way to discover local and remote activities using the Happyly Explore screen. You’ll also appreciate dozens of enhancements to search, bug fixes, and user experience improvements. Happy adventuring!

title: happyly

creator: Happyly LLC
descriptionHtml:
Happyly is your go-to resource for finding activities. With over 8,500 ambassador-ambassador approved reviews, you can find something awesome to do in your home city or when you're on the go!

We are committed to helping you spend less time planning and more time exploring with your people!

Top Features:
— Discover: Choose your own adventure by searching for activities by type or in an awesome map view.
– Giveback: Find in-person or virtual volunteer opportunities with our Giveback Activities, designed to inspire community service and make it easy too!!
— Favorites: Find the perfect spot for your next activity whether it be a nearby park, a trail to hike, your favorite seasonal activity or so much more. Create a list for future fun, or head out on your adventure now!
— Plans: Choose from our trusted local recommendations to build a half or full-day of activities and invite others to join in on the fun.

Interested in learning more? We would love to talk with you! Reach out to us at team@happyly.com.

Terms of Use: https://app.happyly.com/pages/terms
Privacy Policy: https://app.happyly.com/pages/privacy
descriptionShort: Adventures to connect with your people

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: New events and more exciting functionallities

descriptionShort: Adventures to connect with your people

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Thanks for using Happyly! This update includes bug fixes and performance enhancements.
If you run into any trouble, let us know at support@happyly.com

title: Happyly: Hike, Bike, Play

creator: Happyly LLC
descriptionHtml:
Happyly makes it easy to plan memorable activities and build lasting connections. With over 8,500 expertly-curated activities and outings, you can find something awesome to do by yourself or with others—where you live, on the go, or virtually!

Discover: Choose your own adventure by searching for activities by type, or use the handy map view.
Connect: Plan an event or build a half- or full-day of activities and seamlessly invite others to join.
Giveback: Find in-person and virtual volunteer opportunities with our Giveback Activities—all designed to make community service straightforward and fun.
Favorites: Head out on your adventure now or create a list of activities to try and places to explore for future fun!

Explore where you live, get inspired, and build relationships!

Happyly helps you create meaningful moments for work and play. Schedule your next meeting or one-on-one with coworkers, and make plans with family or friends this weekend.

Interested in living and working Happyly? Let’s chat! You can reach out to us at team@happyly.com.

Terms of Use: https:/happyly.com/pages/terms

Privacy Policy: https:/happyly.com/pages/privacy
descriptionShort: Connect with your people

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
New Feature: Happyly Events

Bring your team together with events on Happyly. Whether you wish to set up a walking meeting or cup of coffee with a specific colleague, schedule a co-working day or virtual Giveback opportunity for members of your team, share a professional development opportunity, or provide details about a company-wide event, Happyly is the place to do it. You can quickly and easily create events on your own, or with the support of the Happyly Assistant.

descriptionShort: Connect with your people

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Happy New Year! Today we’re releasing a major update to our activity search and local maps. The new map is faster and makes finding local activities easier than ever!

* Search results are now driven by your current location. Search results will be relevant to the location you’ve selected.
* We’ve introduced more accurate search suggestions and an improved result list view.
* Quickly switch to local map view from search results (and back).
* Plus bug fixes and performance enhancements!

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

Bring friends or family together with Happyly! Set up a walking meeting with a colleague, schedule a virtual Giveback opportunity for members of your team, feature a company-wide event or inform your community about an upcoming local festival, Happyly is the place to do it!

- Easily create an Event and share company-wide or with specific people, and now you can invite your team as identified by each member's profile.
- Bug fixes!!

title: Happyly: Plan, Connect, Play

creator: Happyly LLC
descriptionHtml:
Happyly makes it easy to plan memorable activities and build lasting connections. With over 8,500 expertly-curated activities and outings, you can find something awesome to do by yourself or with others—where you live, on the go, or virtually!

Discover: Choose your own adventure by searching for activities by type, or use the handy map view.
Connect: Plan an event or build a half- or full-day of activities and seamlessly invite others to join.
Giveback: Find in-person and virtual volunteer opportunities with our Giveback Activities—all designed to make community service straightforward and fun.
Favorites: Head out on your adventure now or create a list of activities to try and places to explore for future fun!
